property.name: layoutDirection
property.label: Layout direction
property.description: The layout direction/orientation of the card.

property.name: image
property.label: Image
property.description: Image to be displayed within the card image container. This is optional.

property.name: imageAltText
property.label: Image alternative text
property.description: Alt text for the card's image. This is optional prop, but may be required for an image due to accessibility requirements. This should never be left empty if an image is set.

property.name: horizontalImagePosition
property.label: Horizontal image position
property.description: The position of the image when the card type is set to 'horizontal'. This prop is only necessry when the card type is set to 'horizontal'.

property.name: horizontalImageSize
property.label: Horizontal image size
property.description: The size of the image when the card type is set to 'horizontal'. This prop is only necessry when the card type is set to 'horizontal'.

property.name: ariaLabelText
property.label: Aria label text
property.description: Provides more context as to what the card interaction is doing as an annotation on the hyperlink. This should only be used for accessibility purposes, if the card interaction requires more description than what the text provides.

property.name: heading
property.label: Heading
property.description: Heading in Markdown Link format, including a link for when the card is clicked.

property.name: headingLevel
property.label: Heading level
property.description: The heading level that the label will be rendered as.

property.name: hideDescription
property.label: Hide description
property.description: Denotes that no description should be rendered

property.name: description
property.label: Description
property.description: Provides further details where the title alone may not be sufficient - in Markdown format. Leave empty to get a slot in LWR.
property.default: Use content cards to display all or larger group of content options to your users.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
